ygData.subject: Re: I won my dream item!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Of course, if you were bright and immoral.. you could simply do this twice, assuming you were group leader.  Just make a few macros for some fake seed
ygData.messageBody:
Of course, if you were bright and immoral.. you could simply do this twice, assuming you were group
leader. Just make a few macros for some fake seed generations.. just like you would for the roll.

Cheetr says 'Blah, blah... Here's the seed..'_______
Cheetr could have rolled any number from 1 to 1000
but this time he made sure it was a 378.

Cheetr says 'Blah, blah... Here's the seed..'_______
Cheetr could have rolled any number from 1 to 1000
but this time he made sure it was a 734.

With equivalent macros for the results:

Cheetr says 'Blah, blah... I hope I win.'_______
Cheetr could have rolled any number from 1 to 378
but this time he made sure it was a 370.

Cheetr says 'Blah, blah... I hope I win.'_______
Cheetr could have rolled any number from 1 to 734
but this time he made sure it was a 720.

Would be hard to maintain credibility over time, but could certainly be done a few times in a pickup
group.

Laluni

JasonF wrote:

> From: "JasonF" <jasonf@...>
>
> This is true, and to my knowledge it's the only way to cheat on a roll. If
> Verant hopped the clue train and made the rolls appear in yellow or red
> there'd be no way to cheat. As it is, emotes and rolls are the same color.
> Duh.
>
> Cheetr creates an emote that produces the following:
>
> Cheetr says 'Blah, blah... I hope I win.'_______
> Cheetr could have rolled any number from 1 to 100
> but this time he made sure it was a 98.
>
> Just make double sure that NO ONE in a roll has "said" anything prior to the
> roll itself. If anyone has, reroll, perhaps using the method below:
>
> The leader of the group randoms a number 1 to 100 and then the group rolls
> to that. That way no one can use the emote cheat.
>
> Leader rolls 1 to 100 and gets a 43.
> Everyone else does a /random 1 43 for the winner.
>
> The problem with the 1-6 Alpha method is that if the leader and someone in
> the group are wooking in cahoots, the randomer could make sure his buddy won
> the roll for the item that he really wanted.
>
> [47 Bard] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work
>
